Commands.Focus: Grants 「Medium Max BRV Up」 and 「Medium Attack Up」 for 2 turns
Commands.Fire Enchant: Grants 「Fire Enchant」 for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Meteor (IX): 3-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack  HP damage dealt is divided equally amongst all targets  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  Grants 「Double Black Magic」 for 4 turns   While 「Double Black Magic」 is active:  - Turns 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+」 to 「Double Fire」  　∟ 4-HIT Fire magic BRV+HP attack triggered twice  　∟ Raises own BRV based on Attack before the second attack  　∟ BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets  　∟ Dispels 「Double Black Magic」 after use   「Double Black Magic」 grants BRV regen

Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is at least 50% of Max BRV
Passives.Fire Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using  Fire
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Focus Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Focus
Passives.Fire Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Fire ,  Fire+
Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy
Passives.Black Mage's Mystery: Grants a low probability of poisoning the target with a Fire attack
Passives.Fire Extend: Fire  use +1When using  Fire :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2- Slightly raises total BRV potency- Triggers an HP attack after use
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Greatly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Attack while buffed
Passives.Focus Extend: Focus  use +1When using  Focus :- Slightly improves  Attack Up - Extends the duration  Max BRV Up  and  Attack Up  by 2 turns- Grants  Black Mage's Torch  for 10 turnsAfter using  Focus :- Turns  Fire  to  Fire+  for 6 turns   Increases the number of BRV hits to 3   Slightly raises total BRV potency   BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV   Triggers an HP attack after useWhile  Black Mage's Torch  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+    2-HIT Fire magic BRV attack with a moderate potency boost- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+    Fire magic BRV+HP attack Black Mage's Torch  raises Max BRV and Attack
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Fire Enchant Extend: When using  Fire Enchant , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises Attack

Weapons.Oak Staff CP: 15: When using  Fire :- Raises BRV potency
Weapons.Cypress Pile CP: 35: When using  Focus :- Lowers Action Delay- Improves  Attack Up  and  Max BRV Up , and extends their duration- Raises own BRV based on Attack
Weapons.Octagon Rod CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Meteor (IX)
